title: [Tuts Plus] The Fundamentals of Background Art for Video Games V

About this course::

One of the most important aspects of a successful video game is the environment. The background is what sets the stage for the player, and knowing how to create great-looking backgrounds will improve your value as a designer. We will take a look at basic game design concepts, and then design two tileable game backgrounds using Adobe Illustrator.


Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Introduction

2.Basic Game Design Concepts
2.1Environment Design Basics
2.2Tiling Background Design
2.3Vector vs. Non-Vector

3.Project 1: Jungle Side Scrolling Background

3.2Ground Design
3.3Designing the Trees
3.4Final Details
3.5Jungle Background: Optional Assignment


4.Project 2: Haunted House Scrolling Background
4.1Document Setup and Background Design
4.2Midground Design
4.3Street Design

4.5Adding More Houses
